article: Last August ,our class  _  something very special on our school trip .We  _  to Mount Tai .We  started  our trip at 12:00 at night .Everyone in our class  _  a bag with some food and water .After three  _  ,someone  _  at the map and found out we were't anywhere near the top. My legs  _  so tired that I wanted  to stop  .My classmates told me  to keep  going ,so I went on.Twenty  _  later ,the sun started to come up .It was so beautiful that we forgot about the last five hours !
